home.introText1: and has become one of the leading companies in general contracting, landscape design, and hardscape works in Saudi Arabia.
home.introText2: In 2025, the company was officially classified in construction, building, operation, maintenance, and services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

homeHero.heroSubtitle: Your Partner in Construction & Landscaping Solutions
homeHero.constructionDesc: Providing Reliable Construction Solutions with High Quality Standards
homeHero.landscapeDesc: Designing Landscape & Hardscape Projects with Precision

chairmanMessage.title: Chairman's message
chairmanMessage.p1: Our valued customers and partners, At Sedrat Alwady Company, we operate with an ambitious vision that aligns with the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030, to be an effective partner in developing the urban landscape and improving the quality of life, by providing integrated solutions in general contracting and landscaping works.
chairmanMessage.p2: We are distinguished by our commitment, professionalism in implementation, and attention to the smallest details, while employing the best technical practices and qualified personnel to ensure sustainable projects that add real value to our clients and keep pace with the comprehensive renaissance that the Kingdom is witnessing.
chairmanMessage.p3: I personally promise that we will continue investing in our team and capabilities, expanding our scope of work, and delivering projects that meet your aspirations.
chairmanMessage.name: Mohamed Hassan Alampoji

whoWeAre.title: Who are we?
whoWeAre.card1: Since its establishment in 2015, Sedrat Al Wady has been delivering innovative solutions in construction and landscaping, driven by a strong commitment to quality and sustainability, in alignment with the objectives of Saudi Vision 2030 to enhance urban development and quality of life.
whoWeAre.card2: As part of our continuous pursuit of excellence, Sedrat Al Wady obtained an official construction classification in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in 2025, reflecting our adherence to national standards and our dedication to delivering reliable projects that support sustainable urban development.
whoWeAre.card3: We believe in achieving harmony between construction and nature; therefore, we provide integrated services including construction works, landscaping, green space development, and infrastructure projects, contributing to the creation of sustainable urban environments aligned with Saudi Vision 2030.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.desc: To be a leading provider in contracting and landscaping across Saudi Arabia by delivering innovative, sustainable, and high-quality projects that support the goals of Saudi Vision 2030 and enhance quality of life.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.desc: To achieve customer satisfaction by providing integrated solutions that combine aesthetic excellence, technical precision, and sustainable practices, in alignment with Saudi Vision 2030 and national development standards.

message.title: Our message
message.desc: We strive to build sustainable environments that balance nature and innovation, creating long-term value for communities while contributing to the objectives of Saudi Vision 2030 and future generations.

construction.title: Construction
construction.desc: We provide high-quality construction services delivered with precision, safety, and efficiency. Our team executes every project with professional standards, ensuring durability, accuracy, and timely completion. From structural works to finishing, we build with integrity and excellence.

landscape.title: Landscape
landscape.desc: We design and create sustainable landscape spaces that combine beauty, functionality, and long-lasting greenery. Our landscapes enhance outdoor environments through innovative layouts, precise planting, and elegant natural elements.

supplyingTrees.title: Supplying Trees
supplyingTrees.desc: We supply high-quality trees and plants sourced from trusted nurseries. Our selections are carefully chosen to match regional climate, durability, and project requirements, ensuring healthy growth and long-term performance.

section.title: Construction
section.intro: Sedrat Alwady for general contracting provides a range of services that end up structuring a winning formula for tackling and managing your construction project effectively, including:

list.civil: Civil Works (including steel and concrete works).
list.operation: Operation services for buildings and facilities.
list.cleaning: Cleaning services for various buildings and facilities.

landscape.description: Sedrat Alwady for general contracting provides quality products and services to the landscape industry throughout the region. Our services vary in providing landscaping services with proven technical expertise, including:

list.hardscape: Hardscape (paving, walkways & driveways inside landscape areas).
list.electromechanical: Electromechanical works for water features like fountains, waterfalls & swimming pools.

supplyingTrees.description: Sedrat Alwady: In ecosystems, trees stand as silent architecture, providing oxygen, shaping landscapes, and embodying the timeless connection between nature and humanity. Its sustainable supply preserves harmony and beauty for generations.
supplyingTrees.footerText: Not only that, but we offer everything you need in this field.
